text: 13.18-19 Dan 12.1, Jol 2.2, Lep 7.14 Tap gɨnɨgab anɨb okok, tap tɨmel awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. God alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak tɨkɨl, mɨd dad apɨl mɨdobun ñɨn awl, tɨmel awl yɨbɨl anɨb ak tek ma gak, kɨdek abe anɨb ak tek ma gɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak tek, God nop agnɨgem, yobup lɨnɨmuŋ ñɨn ak ma gɨnɨmuŋ agak.
